items.title: Small-caps rally: 25 stocks jump up to 54% as index breaks 3-week fall
items.description: For the week, BSE Large-cap and Mid-cap indices added 1 percent each and BSE Small-cap index rose 0.4 percent.

items.title: Greed & Fear: Chris Wood maintains only marginal overweight on India amid valuation, supply concerns
items.description: While India remains a long-term structural overweight in Greed & Fear’s framework, Wood cautioned that near-term positioning is only marginally positive.

items.title: Market snaps 6-week losing streak on DII support; rupee appreciates
items.description: The Indian rupee snapped five-week losing streak, ending higher at 87.56 per dollar.
